dct_description_sm: par Guillaume Del'Isle de l'Academie Royale des Sciences.
Shows settlements, forested areas, drainage, roads, the Great Wall, etc.
Decorative title cartouche, depicting male figures with horses.
Scanned raster image of original: 1 map : hand col. ; 48 x 61 cm.
Original in the David Rumsey Collection; scanned by Cartography Associates.
In French with added title in Latin.
